song.englishname: What The World Will Never Take

english.segment1: With all I'm holding inside. With all my hopes and desires. And all the dreams that I've dreamt
english.segment2: With all I'm hoping to be. And all that the world will bring. And all that fails to compare
english.segment3: You say You want all of me. I wouldnt have it any other way
english.segment4: I've got a Saviour and He's living in me. WHOA
english.segment5: I wana know. I wana know You today
english.segment6: And You're the best thing that has happened to me. And the world will never take. The world will never take You away
english.segment7: No-one could ever take You away
